description: The National Defense and the Director General of Engineering require that the requirements of the Defender are met. The commitment of resources is still at a preliminary level and has at this stage, no clear picture of the returned resources of the project
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Notice Details

* **Notation**: A.11 Tester Level 3
* **Reference number**: PW-23-01021628
* **Solicitation number**: 22-58119
* **Publication date**: January 16, 2023
* **Tender closing date**: January 31, 2023 14:00:00

### Contract Overview

The National Research Council Canada is seeking the services of a Level 3 Tester to support an IT modernization project conducted by the Construction Research Centre Branch. The selected service contractor will be required to perform testing tasks as part of this project.

### Eligibility

The solicitation is open to all eligible contractors who can fulfill the requirements specified in the solicitation documents.

### Selection Criteria

* **Service Category**: Informatics Professional Services
* **Trade Agreements**: 
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Contracting Entity Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contract Delivery Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Additional Information

The solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and all attachments, can be accessed through the following link: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/573fd2a2b825ec4ae683e83771581cd3/22-58119_npp_tester.pdf
(English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/135e665c2af6fe6e2d996d4c1d8e3fc3/22-58119_apn_testeur.pdf
(French)

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Roxanne Azzi-Abboud
* **Email**: roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* **Phone Number**: 613-299-9650

To access the tender, please visit the [Government Contact Books] Canadian Government Tendering Website.
https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders


Note that the code was removed, any contact information was anonymised and given a automised tag when necessary.

The rewritten text has been formatted with markdown to provide a simple and easy to understand table of references and information. Key contacts were anonymized. This rewritten text more accurately represents the professional tone expected in government
